{"id":1737965406,"question_id":3980,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1755398812,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1226 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1737965406/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock using Strategy","memory":"302.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxProfit(vector<int>& prices, vector<int>& strategy, int k) {\n        // step 1: return base cost\n        // step 4: sliding window? \n\n        int N = (int)prices.size();\n        long long ans = 0, roll = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            ans += prices[i] * 1LL * strategy[i];\n            if (i < k) {\n                roll += (i < k/2 ? 0 : 1) * 1LL * prices[i];\n            } else {\n                roll += prices[i] * 1LL * strategy[i];\n            }\n        }\n        cout << roll << endl;\n        ans = max(roll, ans);\n        \n        for (int i=k; i<N; i++) {\n            roll += prices[i-k] * 1LL * strategy[i-k];\n            roll -= prices[i-k/2];\n            roll += prices[i] - (prices[i] * 1LL * strategy[i]);\n                 \n            cout << roll << endl;\n            ans = max(roll, ans);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock-using-strategy","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1178}
